description.value: Primary Energy: Space 6 (complex illusion + medium range + 20ft cube area) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 10 minutes) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (20-foot cube) Duration: 10 minutes Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Create an illusion of an object, creature, or phenomenon within a 20-foot cube at medium range. The illusion includes sight, sound, smell, and temperature effects. Physical interaction reveals it as an illusion. Saving Throw: Perception vs Space Mastery Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 4 hours or can include tactile sensations, 5 = 12 hours + tactile + olfactory
